+ Summary

Sofia darkness is the most powerfull of the o5 type characters in Foundation Crumbling. Super angle chFged is sophia light secret evil twin from hell
 

++ Powers and Stats

soap is the strongest multi verdal charactre in the game, and my original characters (do not steel).

sofia is the only charcuterie who has survived the world ending and is the canonical only surviver before the activation of SPC-2000 (only fax spoken). The reson Sofia is in so many stories and canons is not only because of the epicness of her character, but because she axe as a conceptual omniversal anchor of which the univsere would fall apart around her

++ Notable Matchups

Sofia Dark vs. Sleep (High diff)
Sofia Dark vs. Clef (Still ongoing)
Sofia Dark vs. Sofia Dark (Sofia Dark wins)
